sentences.sContent: She behaved in a very responsible way .
I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.sCn: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

sentences.sContent: ...It was only when they shifted their attention from how companies behave to how they think that they began to make sense of their voluminous material...
...Children also learn to behave as boys or girls through observation and imitation...
...Social learning theories contribute to our understanding of why we behave as we do...

synos.tran: 表现；（机器等）运转；举止端正；（事物）起某种作用

phrases.pCn: 表现好；举止得体；行为检点；表现良好
请检点一点，行为规矩些

words.tran: 把…砍首（behead的现在分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 表现，举止；运转，做出反应
trans.tranOther: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc
The way that you behave is the way that you do and say things, and the things that you do and say
